org.spongepowered.api.data.property.item

Class UseLimitProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.data.property.AbstractProperty<String,Integer>
      • org.spongepowered.api.data.property.IntProperty
        • org.spongepowered.api.data.property.item.UseLimitProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Property<?,?>>, Property<String,Integer>

    public class UseLimitProperty
extends IntProperty
    Represents a limit on the number of uses on an item. Whether the uses are defined as durability or another item data value, usually, when the uses exceed this use limit, the item is removed or consumed.
